dict.acceptation: 速度；比率；等级；（利息等的）费率；
被评价；被认为；被列入；申斥；

sent.orig: Moderate recovery rate Faster recovery rate Faster recovery rate Fastest recovery rate PC.
Moderate recovery rate Faster recovery rate Faster recovery rate Fastest recovery rate P.
sent.trans: 此魔法只对亡灵怪物有效。

sent.orig: Moderate recovery rate Faster recovery rate Faster recovery rate Fastest recovery rate PM.
sent.trans: 在怪物被麻痹过程中你可以全力进攻，而它全无还手之力。

sent.orig: The company is a group first-rate management first-rate technology first-rate service and a first-rate staff.
sent.trans: 本公司是一家治理一流、技术一流、服务一流、员工一流的集团公司。

sent.orig: Fourth rate talents, third-rate management, second rate facilities, rate clients.
sent.trans: 四流人才、三流管理、二流设备、一流客户。
